keyFeatures.title: Help Desk
keyFeatures.description: Immediate support for technical issues to ensure quick resolutions.

keyFeatures.title: Hardware Performance & Management
keyFeatures.description: Regular monitoring and optimization of hardware performance for system reliability.

keyFeatures.title: Application System Administration
keyFeatures.description: Efficient management of SAP system configurations, user profiles, and settings.

keyFeatures.title: Patches & Fixes Management
keyFeatures.description: Timely installation of critical patches and fixes to ensure your system is up-to-date and secure.

keyFeatures.title: User Profile Management
keyFeatures.description: Control and manage user access rights to maintain security and workflow efficiency.

keyFeatures.title: Batch Scheduling and Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Ensure scheduled jobs are executed on time without errors.

keyFeatures.title: Interface Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Continuous monitoring of SAP interfaces to ensure smooth data flow across systems.

keyFeatures.title: Database Monitoring
keyFeatures.description: Proactive monitoring of your database for peak performance and integrity.

keyFeatures.title: Network Support
keyFeatures.description: Network infrastructure support to ensure seamless connectivity for SAP applications.

keyFeatures.title: ABAP Production / Development Support
keyFeatures.description: Specialized support for ABAP programming, troubleshooting, and development.
